column1: The  Road  Passenger  Transport  Authority  of  the  Sabaragamuwa  Province
(hereinafter  sometimes  referred  to  as  Sabaragamuwa  Transport  Authority
and/or Authority) is an independent institution, established under the 13th
Amendment to the Constitution, and under and by virtue of the provisions of
